dmca.title: [TP-C745436F] Slander
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: The URL sinefaring.com is currently not accessible as of 11:00:22 a.m. (GMT-6) on September 8, 2006. Please note that the website Steadipimp.com does not reside within our network as of 11:01:00 a.m. (GMT-6). Legal Response Team The Planet -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Thursday, September 07, 2006 9:28 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C745436F] Slander Subject: [TP-C745436F] Slander From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C745436F] Slander Reference: [TP-C745436F] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Slander Added by system at Thursday, Sep 7 2006 01:46 pm X-MailFrom: m@matthewchubet.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Thu Sep 7 13:46:02 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 07 Sep 2006 13:46:02 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from m@matthewchubet.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GLOt0-000FtK-3B for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Sep 2006 13:46:02 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 7 Sep 2006 13:46:00 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from m@matthewchubet.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GLOsy-0001DI-1r for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Sep 2006 13:46:00 -0500 Received: from wcmta3.mycingular.net ([66.102.172.233]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from m@matthewchubet.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GLOso-000Fqf-E6 for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Sep 2006 13:45:50 -0500 Received: from [10.199.71.86] ([10.199.71.86]) by wcmta3.mycingular.net (8.12.11/8.12.11) with ESMTP id k87Ij87W007034 for ; Thu, 7 Sep 2006 13:45:12 -0500 (CDT) (envelope-from m@matthewchubet.com) User-Agent: Microsoft-Entourage/11.2.5.060620 Date: Thu, 07 Sep 2006 11:45:06 -0700 Subject: Slander From: Matthew Chubet To: Message-ID: Thread-Topic: Slander Thread-Index: AcbSrbx7+u9H0T6gEdu4WAAKJ65+ng== Mime-version: 1.0 Content-type: multipart/related; boundary="B_3240474313_888467" X-PMX-Version: 4.7.1.128075, Antispam-Engine: 2.0.3.0, Antispam-Data: 2006.9.7.102942 Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 66.102.172.233 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of matthewchubet.com) client-ip=66.102.172.233; envelope-from=m@matthewchubet.com; helo=wcmta3.mycingular.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 07 Sep 2006 18:46:01.0021 (UTC) FILETIME=[DD46AED0:01C6D2AD] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) > This message is in MIME format. Since your mail reader does not > understand this format, some or all of this message may not be legible. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello - My name is Matthew Chubet. You formerly hosted a web site which slanders me ­ and currently host a web site which slanders me. Sinefaring.com and Steadipimp.com If you google my name, Matthew Chubet, you find a cached web page with a very high relevency which uses my name as the embedded html title - It¹s a bunch of gibberish ­ but potential clients will only have seen Google¹s summary ­ viagra, finasteride, pharmacy. And, if you google search steadipimp ­ you will find business directories which still link me to steadipimp - a former url which was not authorized to be transferred or auctioned, yet was transferred and auctioned by google. Steadipimp.com is a very sick and twisted porn site full of granny sex and stuff like that. Please cooperate with me. I live in Marina Del Rey. ICANN is down the street. What is the contact information of your billing records? I want to see the complete billing records for both web sites. It may have changed several times. I want to know who or whom have paid the bills and administered the site. I want all the relevent information that would be needed to identify who the bastard is. And investigate whether they are the same person or connected. The fact that both sites are hosted by your service leads me to believe they are connected. I work freelance. Clients Google me to establish my credentials. This smut has hurt my career. Destroyed my retirement funding. Slandered an ex-Marine. And cause a former NYC resident who witnessed the events of 9/11 great emotional pain. I hope you will cooperate. Also ­ cease and desist hosting steadipimp.com. Thank-you Matthew Chubet SOC http://www.matthewchubet.com 310.991.0791 MIME element (text/html) Slander Hello -

My name is Matthew Chubet.

You formerly hosted a web site which slanders me – and currently host a web site which slanders me.

Sinefaring.com and Steadipimp.com

If you google my name, Matthew Chubet, you find a cached web page with a very high relevency which uses my name as the embedded html title -
It’s a bunch of gibberish – but potential clients will only have seen Google’s summary – viagra, finasteride, pharmacy.

And, if you google search steadipimp – you will find business directories which still link me to steadipimp - a former url which was not authorized to be transferred or auctioned, yet was transferred and auctioned by google.

Steadipimp.com is a very sick and twisted porn site full of granny sex and stuff like that.

Please cooperate with me.  I live in Marina Del Rey.  ICANN is down the street.

What is the contact information of your billing records?
I want to see the complete billing records for both web sites.  It may have changed several times.
I want to know who or whom have paid the bills and administered the site.
I want all the relevent information that would be needed to identify who the bastard is.  And investigate whether they are the same person or connected.
The fact that both sites are hosted by your service leads me to believe they are connected.

I work freelance.  Clients Google me to establish my credentials.  This smut has hurt my career.  Destroyed my retirement funding.  Slandered an ex-Marine.  And cause a former NYC resident who witnessed the events of 9/11 great emotional pain.

I hope you will cooperate.

Also – cease and desist hosting steadipimp.com.

Thank-you
Matthew Chubet SOC
http://www.matthewchubet.com
310.991.0791
